name: BitcoinCashMonitor
0:
”Alexa, open Bitcoin Cash Monitor.”
”Alexa, ask Bitcoin Cash Monitor what the current value is.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bitcoin cash monitor
des: The Bitcoin Cash Monitor allows quick and easy access to the current value of bitcoin cash as it relates to the U.S. dollar. Simply ask this skill and you will know the current value and can act accordingly.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
